ci_support_linux_.yaml:
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- '2.7'

about.description:
`potranslator` is a package to easily translate po and pot files generated by Sphinx_ or other tools in any language supported by Google Translate.
`potranslator` auto-detects the language in the original pot files and auto-translates the pot files into the supplied target languages.
The Command Line Interface of `potranslator` and its documentation are based on sphinx-intl_.
Optional: supports the Transifex collaborative service to upload the auto-generated translations to transifex_ for collaborative corrections of the translations..
about.summary: A python package to easily translate po and pot files in any language supported by Google Translate.

name: potranslator

about.description:
`potranslator` is a package to easily translate po and pot files generated by Sphinx_ or other tools in any language supported by Google Translate.
`potranslator` auto-detects the language in the original pot files and auto-translates the pot files into the supplied target languages.
The Command Line Interface of `potranslator` and its documentation are based on sphinx-intl_.
Optional: supports the Transifex collaborative service to upload the auto-generated translations to transifex_ for collaborative corrections of the translations..
about.summary: A python package to easily translate po and pot files in any language supported by Google Translate.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "potranslator" %}
{% set version = "1.1.5" %}
{% set file_ext = "tar.gz" %}
{% set hash_type = "sha256" %}
{% set hash_value = "230ec5fea71b96d839240b5e583d45a7f13a00a7d5cdd7d844840f6645e014d5" %}

package:
  name: '{{ name|lower }}'
  version: '{{ version }}'

source:
  fn: '{{ name }}-{{ version }}.{{ file_ext }}'
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.{{ file_ext }}
  '{{ hash_type }}': '{{ hash_value }}'

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  entry_points:
    - potranslator=potranslator.commands:main
  script: python -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed .

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools
    - pytest-runner

  run:
    - python
    - cython
    - click >=6.0
    - docutils
    - lxml
    - sphinx
    - PyYAML
    - googletrans
    - polib
    - path.py
    - importlib_resources

test:
  imports:
    - potranslator

about:
  home: https://github.com/SekouD/potranslator
  license: BSD
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: "A python package to easily translate po and pot files in any language supported by Google Translate."
  description: "`potranslator` is a package to easily translate po and pot files generated by Sphinx_ or other tools in any language supported by Google Translate.\n`potranslator` auto-detects the language in the original pot files and auto-translates the pot files into the supplied target languages.\nThe Command Line Interface of `potranslator` and its documentation are based on sphinx-intl_.\nOptional: supports the Transifex collaborative service to upload the auto-generated translations to transifex_ for collaborative corrections of the translations..\n\
    \n\n\n\n\n\n"
  doc_url: https://potranslator.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
  dev_url: https://github.com/SekouD/potranslator

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - SekouD

about.description:
`potranslator` is a package to easily translate po and pot files generated by Sphinx_ or other tools in any language supported by Google Translate.
`potranslator` auto-detects the language in the original pot files and auto-translates the pot files into the supplied target languages.
The Command Line Interface of `potranslator` and its documentation are based on sphinx-intl_.
Optional: supports the Transifex collaborative service to upload the auto-generated translations to transifex_ for collaborative corrections of the translations..
about.summary: A python package to easily translate po and pot files in any language supported by Google Translate.
